channel.title: Client Issues (Never before seen?) [317]
channel.description:
Every time I try to run a 317 client, I log in just fine, then i begin to walk around and my client closes, and in the CMD or "error" notepad it shows this:
[IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn114/RS-PICS-XD/JAVAErr.png[/img]
I do not have this probelm with any other type of protocol (508, 525, 602, etc).
Thanks, I could REALLY use some help.
I have JDK1.6.0_21 I don't know if this affects anything, but I also have JRE6.
I'm having this problem with the Silabsoft 317 Client version 7.
Thanks. :confused:

item.title: Client Issues (Never before seen?) [317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Noo_Noob The Noo Noob
item.description:
@The_Noo_Noob wrote:

Thanks dude! THANKS A LOT!

Read full topic

item.title: Client Issues (Never before seen?) [317]
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

This is caused by a 64 bit computer. Just google bat to exe converter, download it, then open it, click the “…” at the top, find your batch file that runs your client. Double click it, and compile. Run the exe instead of the batch.

Read full topic
